full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
 Details of the Government Tender Announcement for the **Senior Exercise Designer** (French: **Concepteur d'exercices principal**) position.

#### Project Title
 Mono-Modal Exercise Design
 Exhibit Prioritising Regional Health Authority (RHA) Participation


#### Announcement Details:

*   **Contract Number**: PW-22-01012783
*   **Tender Reference Number**: 1000243144
*   **Publication Date**: November 7, 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: November 24, 2022, by 2:00:00 PM (EST)
 

#### Description
The Public Health Agency of Canada is inviting Proposals for a **Senior Exercise Designer** to design and deliver emergency response exercises.

The successful Proposal will involve up to 2080 hours, at an estimated duration of 2 years, from December 5, 2022 to December 31, 2024.

#### Key Responsibilities:

The Exercise Designer will coordinate emergency response exercises under the guidance of the Integrated Planning, Exercises and Lessons Learned Unit (IPELLU).

The key responsibilities include:

*   Conducting exercises and providing education and training related to emergency management.
*   Conducting exercises and training in relation to emergency management plans pertaing to the Minister's area of responsibility.
*   Designing and delivering emergency response exercises.

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is open to candidates who are Canadian citizens or authorized to work in Canada. The services of the successful bidder may be subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

#### Proposal Submission
All interested Proposers must submit their Proposals in writing in the form of a Request for Proposal (RFP) to the contact person listed below.

#### Certificate of Non-Provocation of UN arms embargo (CnA)
Binder contain instruction on certificate filling, please reference CnA filling instruction attached to the notice disposition details under contract section.

**Contact Information**
If you are requesting information, Clarify,debate or updates,.  you may contact us though the contact list below.

*   **Mallon, Jeremy** by email **jeremy.mallon@canada.ca**.
